projects.title: Supervision Ben Quarshie Honyenuga PhD
projects.description:
Doctorate Thesis: Knowledge Management, Management Innovation and High Performance Organizations in an Emerging Market
The study aims to develop and test a model of High Performance Organizations (HPOs) in an emerging market context. Specifically, the study aims at analyzing the influence of Knowledge Management (KM) and Management Innovation (MI) on Organizational Performance as well as the mediating influence of the HPO dimensions. From a survey of 186 managers among the insurance industry in Ghana and by using Partial Least Squares Estimation, the results reveal that combining Knowledge Management and Management Innovation with the HPO dimensions generate synergy that increases performance of HPOs in an emerging market. The study therefore contributes to existing theory by providing an understanding of the predictive validity of the HPO framework on Organizational Performance in an emerging Market context. It also provides a predictive validity of Knowledge Management and Management Innovation via the HPO framework in an emerging market context. The study therefore provides for a basis for a model of HPOs in Ghana an emerging market. The research model in this study therefore may become a reference point for managers who are in search of indicators which will increase the chances of their organizations to become HPOs. When companies utilize the findings of the research, and become HPOs, they will increase performance which will have a multiplier effect on the economic development of Ghana in general.

Ben defended his thesis succesfully on Friday, July 10th, 2015

company.name: Vereniging Vrienden van Maastricht Aachen Airport

profile_positions.company: Vereniging Vrienden van Maastricht Aachen Airport
profile_positions.description: VvMAA, de Vereniging Vrienden van Maastricht Aachen Airport, is ‘de supportersclub’ van onze regionale luchthaven. Ze bundelt en versterkt de steun aan het Limburgse vliegveld, omdat een eigen, complete luchthaven van groot belang is voor de verdere ontwikkeling van de regio. De VVMAA draagt de betekenis van Maastricht Aachen Airport (MAA) zo breed mogelijk uit.
profile_positions.title: Lid van het Bestuur van de Vereniging
